title: Behavior of derivatives from graph of function

content.question: The graph of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>y</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mi>f</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EB0@</annotation> </semantics> </math> is shown in the figure above. topic.text: 5.3: Determining Intervals on Which a Function Is Increasing or Decreasing

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
